ComicInfo.Summary: Port of Dreams: The captured La Sirena sails with Sly and his men to show them where she has hidden her treasure. Instead she leads them to a grotto populated with deadly mermaids who kill all of his men while Sly escapes in a rowboat. Left alone on the ship, Billy frees Sirena and they sail for the pirate haven, Port of Dreams. Sirena meets with her fellow captains and makes future plans. A wounded Sly makes it back to his ship and uses the chained Ophelia to purge himself of the mermaid's evil.
ComicInfo.Tags: Billy Blue,El Nino,Jack Sly,La Sirena,Ophelia Strong,The Father
ComicInfo.Title: Port of Dreams
